description: We need to buy Qty 1x Cold Filter Plugging Point and ILS deliverables for delivery to QETE, Gatineau, QC. It takes 10 weeks after contract award. There is a security requirement. This procurement is subject to the Crown retaining the right to negotiate with suppliers. The tender documentation can be submitted in mostly official Canadian language in either English or French.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title
Cold Filter Plugging Point Instrument

### Reference Number
cb-7269-77124915

### Amendment Number
3

### Solicitation Number
W8476-246738/A

### Publication Date
July 17, 2023

### Closing Date for Tender Submissions
August 30, 2023 2:00 PM (EST)

### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting a proposal to procure and deliver one (1) Cold Filter Plugging Point instrument along with ILS (Insensitive Munition System) deliverables to QETE, Gatineau, Quebec. The requested delivery date is within 10 weeks after contract award.

### Important Notes
* Security requirements are associated with this procurement.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurement.

### Documents
See the attached tender documents for further information. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact Roxanne Grenier, DLP 5-3-1, at Roxanne.Grenier@forces.gc.ca or (555) 555-5555.

### Technical Specifications
Laboratory and scientific equipment (*41100000) are required for this procurement.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Ending Date
Tender submissions are not accepted after August 30, 2023. The tender is now expired.
